verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>sojourning<s%> on the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> to him a <S%H802>concubine<s%> <S%H6370><s%> out of <S%H4480>Bethlehem-judah.<s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and went <S%H1980>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem-judah,<s%> <S%H3063><s%> and <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5921>friendly<s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto her, and to bring her <S%H7725>again,<s%> having his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>asses:<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and when the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, he <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him.

And his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H2388>retained<s%> him; and he <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1980>depart:<s%> and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H2860>son-in-law,<s%> <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> with a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> go your <S%H1980>way.<s%>

And they sat <S%H3427>down,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together:<s%> for the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> Be <S%H2974>content,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and tarry all <S%H3885>night,<s%> and let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1980>depart,<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law<s%> <S%H6484>urged<s%> him: therefore he <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And he arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H1980>depart:<s%> and the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5582>Comfort<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee.<s%> And they <S%H4102>tarried<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H5186>afternoon,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them.

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1980>depart,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in-law,<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7503>draweth<s%> toward <S%H6150>evening,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you<s%> tarry all <S%H3885>night:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> groweth to an <S%H2583>end,<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> may be <S%H3190>merry;<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> get you <S%H7925>early<s%> on your <S%H1870>way,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H168>home.<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> tarry that <S%H3885>night,<s%> but he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1980>departed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> over <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H5227><s%> <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and there were <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H6776>two<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H2280>saddled,<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> also was <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And when <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H5973>by<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H7286>spent;<s%> and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and let us turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in it.

And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, We will <S%H3808>not<s%> turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> hither <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of a <S%H5237>stranger,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> we will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places<s%> to lodge all <S%H3885>night,<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

And they passed <S%H5674>on<s%> and went their <S%H1980>way;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down<s%> upon them when they were <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongeth to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And they turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> and to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> and when he went <S%H935>in,<s%> he sat him <S%H3427>down<s%> in a <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> for there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>took<s%> them into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>lodging.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> his <S%H4639>work<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> <S%H3676>which<s%> was also of <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> but the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites.<s%>

And when he had lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4480>Whither<s%> <S%H575><s%> <S%H1980>goest<s%> thou? and <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H587>We<s%> are <S%H5674>passing<s%> from <S%H4480>Bethlehem-judah<s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> the <S%H3411>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> am <S%H595>I:<s%> and I <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem-judah,<s%> <S%H3063><s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> am now <S%H1980>going<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>receiveth<s%> me to <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Yet there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%> for our <S%H2543>asses;<s%> and there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> for me, and for thy <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and for the young <S%H5288>man<s%> which is <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>want<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

And the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be with thee; <S%H7535>howsoever<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4270>wants<s%> lie <S%H5921>upon<s%> me; <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in the <S%H7339>street.<s%>

So he <S%H935>brought<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and gave <S%H1101>provender<s%> unto the <S%H2543>asses:<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Now as <S%H1992>they<s%> were making their hearts <S%H3190>merry,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> beset the house round <S%H5437>about,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H1849>beat<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the old <S%H2205>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> him.

And the <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H408>Nay,<s%> my <S%H251>brethren,<s%> nay, I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> do not so <S%H7489>wickedly;<s%> <S%H408><s%> seeing <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> mine <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5039>folly.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> here is my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1330>maiden,<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubine;<s%> them I will bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H6031>humble<s%> ye them, and <S%H6213>do<s%> with them what <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto you: but unto <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2063>so<s%> <S%H5039>vile<s%> a <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

But the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to him: so the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>took<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and brought her <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> her, and <S%H5953>abused<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and when the <S%H7837>day<s%> began to <S%H5927>spring,<s%> they let her <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H6437>dawning<s%> of the <S%H1242>day,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> her <S%H113>lord<s%> was, <S%H5704>till<s%> it was <S%H216>light.<s%>

And her <S%H113>lord<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> his <S%H1870>way:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and her <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H6965>Up,<s%> and let us be <S%H1980>going.<s%> But <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H6030>answered.<s%> Then the man <S%H3947>took<s%> her up <S%H5921>upon<s%> an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H1980>got<s%> him unto his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3979>knife,<s%> and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H5408>divided<s%> her, together with her <S%H6106>bones,<s%> into <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7200>saw<s%> it <S%H559>said,<s%> There was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2063>such<s%> deed <S%H1961>done<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> it, take <S%H5779>advice,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> your minds.
